column4: Can anyone explain to me my I can't sync my time with ntp.ubuntu.com   http://paste.ubuntu.com/1307278/    Thats the output from ntpdate -q
no server suitable for synchronization found
the -d is just for debug â€¦ dropping it makes no difference.
and still unable to sync with the server you specified.
You think my port 123 is blocked going out?
I don't know, but tested from mine and works ok.  That's all I can think of is that you have a network issue.
Maybe your router has a time server running?
